parameters.description: Array values for the coordinates of the start point of the line

parameters.name: EndPoint
parameters.description: Array values for the coordinates of the end point of the line

title: ICurve.IConvertLineToBcurveSize
description: Converts the specified line into a b-spline curve.
signature:
System.Int32 IConvertLineToBcurveSize( 
   ref System.Double
StartPoint
,
   ref System.Double
EndPoint
)

parameters.name: StartPoint
parameters.description: Array values for the coordinates of the start point of the line

parameters.name: EndPoint
parameters.description: Array values for the coordinates of the end point of the line

returns: Array giving the b-spline representation of the line
